content: The simplest and most recommended method to start using `litecart` on Windows is by installing and utilizing the `litecart` command-line tool. Execute the given command in your terminal and adhere to the instructions displayed on the screen. ```bash curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/shurco/litecart/main/scripts/install | sh ``` or download and unzip the [latest version](https://github.com/shurco/litecart/releases/latest) for Windows. ####  Run using Docker Docker enables the management and operation of a `litecart` instance without requiring the installation of any command-line tools. The `litecart` Docker container includes all necessary command-line tools or even for server execution.
